name: tfr1ALT

body.origin:
|- wfn(c0, con0)
-| wwe(cep, con0)
-| wse(cep, con0)
-| wceq(c0, cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0[Fn]On
⊣ ∈ ≤ On
⊣ ∈[Se]On
⊣ c0 = wrecs(∈, On, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(c0, con0)
-| wwe(cep, con0)
-| wse(cep, con0)
-| wceq(c0, cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[Fn]On
⊣ ∈ ≤ On
⊣ ∈[Se]On
⊣ c0 = wrecs(∈, On, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(c0, con0)
-| wse(cep, con0)
-| wceq(c0, cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))

|- wfn(c0, con0)
-| wceq(c0, cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, crecs(c1))
-| wceq(crecs(c1), cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 = wrecs(∈, On, c1)
⊣ c0 = recs(c1)
⊣ recs(c1)= wrecs(∈, On, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(c0, con0)
-| wceq(c0, crecs(c1))
-| wceq(crecs(c1), cwrecs(cep, con0, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[Fn]On
⊣ c0 = recs(c1)
⊣ recs(c1)= wrecs(∈, On, c1)

comment: Alternate proof of ~ tfr1 using well-founded recursion. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Aug-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
